name: Pachillinko
description:
Pachillinko is a mix of japanese Pachinko and western Plinko style game, set in neon synthwave design with some retro feeling of 80s.
Relaxing mouse-only clicking gameplay allows you to sit back and just chill...

Game features:
- Pachinko game mode
- Plinko game mode
- Spinning slot wheel for extra cash
- Incremental progression
- Relaxing synthwave music
- Great mix of idle and active gameplay
- Neon cyberpunk visuals
- Rhytm based special visual effects
- Total chill
- Total relax
